title: Devastated Marnie Simpson 'smashes up her house' after discovering Lewis Bloor cheated
text:
Devastated Marnie Simpson 'smashes up her house' after discovering Lewis Bloor cheated The distraught Geordie Shore star has taken to Snapchat to slam her ex-boyfriend for 'bedding another woman' Share Click   Marnie Simpson posts HEARTBREAKING video after Lewis Bloor 'cheating' footage emerges Share this video Get     
Marnie Simpson has reacted to finding out that Lewis Bloor cheated on her. 
A shocking recording appeared online yesterday showing a half-naked Lewis in bed and sharing a snog under the covers with the brunette beauty while a friend filmed the intimate moment . 
After slamming Lewis in a Twitter rant, a devastated Marnie took to Snapchat to reveal how she felt about Lewis' upsetting betrayal. 
She told her followers: "I don't normally do videos, but I feel like I want to get my point across about what the hell has just happened. Marnie Simpson, Lewis Bloor (Photo: FameFlynet) 
"I've been filming for Geordie Shore for three weeks with no contact, so I haven't been able to contact ANYONE. 
"While I was in Geordie Shore it was Valentine's night, and I was really upset. I sent Lewis a lovely card, three pages long." 
Marnie continued: "I tried to ring him the next day and he didn't answer his phone – I just had this gut feeling. He answered hours later." (Photo: Snapchat/MarnieGshore) 
Marnie went on: "On the phone he was like: 'baby I miss you so much, can't wait for you to come back to our home, it's been so hard without you' – he actually sent a bunch of roses to the Geordie Shore house." 
Not knowing how to cope with her feelings of anger, Marnie claims that she ended up "smashing up" her home in frustration. (Photo: Snapchat) 
"I can't actually believe it. I cried, I screamed, I have smashed my house up. Every emotion - I'm still in shock," she added. 
Just hours after the story broke, Marnie took to social media to confirm the news and slam her ex-boyfriend's womanising ways. 
She wrote in a scathing Twitter rant: "Didn't really want the whole country to know but looks like that didn't last long . Happy Valentine's Day to me. U f**king scumbag!" Like us on Facebook
